modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod reduces the reach of all zeds so that you can manage the fights on servers. Does not touch player hands.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod reduces the reach of all [zeds](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) so that you can manage the fights on servers. Does not touch player hands.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/A19ModletsJax/tree/a19b168/JaxTeller718_ZombieReach)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_ZombieHandAdjustment)** for A18

If you appreciate JaxTeller718â€™s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19674-jaxteller718-a19-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
